## ./pachctl port-forward

Forward a port on the local machine to pachd. This command blocks.

### Synopsis


Forward a port on the local machine to pachd. This command blocks.

```
./pachctl port-forward
```

### Options

```
  -p, --port int   The local port to bind to. (default 30650)
```
